documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.

id.description: Unique id for a particular instance of this type.

effects.description: Intrinsic effects provided by the structure, often bonuses granted to owners or occupiers.

equipment.description: Inventory actively mounted on this structure and affecting the structure, usually in a positive way and usually during battle.

name.description: Descriptive, unique name for this structure.

storage.description: Inventory stored within this structure that does not actively affect this structure or anything interacting with it.
